programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2005/06 season. Jose Mourinho continued his success with Chelsea, Alan Shearer broke Newcastle's scoring record and Harry Redknapp rescued Portsmouth from the drop.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2006/07 season. Ashley Cole began life at Chelsea, Arsene Wenger celebrated his 10th year in charge and West Ham snapped up Carlos Tevez and Javier Mascherano.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2007/08 season. Jose Mourinho's first tenure as Chelsea manager ended, Cristiano Ronaldo topped the scoring charts and Fulham dramatically escaped relegation.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2008/09 season. Manchester City began a new era under new ownership, Manchester United secured a third successive title and Newcastle were dramatically relegated.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2009/10 season. Top scorer Didier Drogba fired Chelsea to the title, Manchester City spent big and Spurs secured Champions League qualification for the first time.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2010/11 season. Man Utd surpassed Liverpool's record of 18 top-flight titles, Man City secured the signing of Yaya Toure and Wolves dramatically avoided relegation.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2011/12 season. As the competition entered its 20th year, Man City won their first title in dramatic fashion and Wigan produced a great escape to avoid the drop.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2012/13 season. Sir Alex Ferguson ended his managerial career as Manchester United clinched their 13th Premier League title and FA Cup winners Wigan were relegated.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2013/14 season. Manchester City clinched their second Premier League title, Jose Mourinho returned to Chelsea and Tony Pulis masterminded a great escape at Palace.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2014/15 season. Eden Hazard's superb form helped Chelsea clinch their fifth title and newly-promoted Burnley and QPR made immediate returns to the Championship.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2015/16 season. Leicester City shocked the footballing world, Jose Mourinho's second tenure at Chelsea came to an end and Newcastle dropped into the second tier.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: Take a look back at the 2016/17 Premier League season as Chelsea win their fifth Premier League title and reigning champions Leicester set a new record for worst title defence.

programme.title: The Boot Room Boys

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover agent Nick finds himself in a moral dilemma when the time to betray his mentor finally came. Starring Andy Lau, Louis Koo, Daniel Wu and more!

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: Winner of 8 HKFA awards & featuring an all-star cast, this film depicts an elite team guarding Dr Sun Yat Sen in Hong Kong, as he discusses plans to overthrow the Qing dynasty.

programme.title: I Fine..Thank You..Love You
programme.desc: In this high grossing Thai romcom starring Sunny who portrays Yim. In order to win back his Japanese girlfriend, Yim hires a charming tutor to improve his English but falls for her instead.

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: A triad boss aims to clean up his image and win Laika's mayoral seat amid a regime change, but struggles with funding issues. As his enforcers resort to violence, unexpected tensions arise among them.

programme.title: Where the Wind Blows
programme.desc: Two notorious corrupt police officers, Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong were found to build a corruption network between the triad and police, the ICAC begins to hunt them down to end their control.

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, once a golden boy, sees his glory fade after the birth of Xu Qi An. Yet, rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: Ordinary girl Bao meets troubled rich guy Edward. They conspire to ruin his father's remarriage and love blossoms. However, their romance takes an unexpected turn...

programme.title: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: An innocent Hong Kong businessman is wrongfully imprisoned in a brutal multinational prison, and must escape the sadistic warden's torture to survive.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Two talented basketball players, one seeking his parents and the other, a depressed alcoholic, are forced to compromise for the sake of the game. Starring Jay Chou, Eric Tsang, Ng Man Tat & more.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as the Asian Hawk, a top agent sent to retrieve the bronze heads of twelve animals of the Chinese Zodiac, stolen in Beijing in 1860.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Customs officers uncover illegal weapons on a cargo ship linked to an international conflict. Elite agents go undercover and reveal a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career, but Adam is determined to win her back and makes 77 attempts to do so. The situation worsens when a Thai movie idol courts Eva

programme.title: The Wandering Earth 2
programme.desc: Set as a prequel, when the sun was found to be dying, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home. To save the world, a group of young people decide to step forth.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Yun and Fei, face challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, and Fei and his girlfriend opt for a 'marriage cooling-off period' to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The HK police is hunting for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. They recruit artist Lee Man to help in their quest, but the real identity of Painter surprises everyone.

programme.title: God Of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: The Saint of Gamblers (Andy Lau) and the Saint of Gamblers (Stephen Chow) clash, then combine to defeat their master's nemesis.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: When a luxury hotel in Hong Kong suddenly becomes a Coronavirus superspreader, guests & the staff are faced with a 14-day trial they may not survive.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a man whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, it's showbiz serendipity in this 2015 installment of Lucky Star.

programme.title: From Beijing with Love
programme.desc: A retired spy Ling Ling Chat, now a meat vendor is brought in to investigate a case after a giant dinosaur skull is stolen.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: An undercover police who infiltrated the triad and a triad mole planted into the police force must work together to survive the cutthroat underworld.

programme.desc: THE SNOOPY SHOW follows Charles Schulzs beloved character Snoopy, the happy-dancing, big-dreaming beagle that's full of character and unstoppable imagination.
Niecy Nash hosts the all new version of the popular game show, challenging contestants musical memory, as they get one song closer to winning $1 million if they dont forget the lyrics.

The documentary series Free at last shows how Apartheid still affects South Africa today. To move forward, the country must address its dark past. Through moving and personal stories from both victims and perpetrators and never seen before footage, we shed light on what has remained hidden for so long. programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.

Returning after an enforced minibreak of its own, Travel Man is back with new host Joe Lycett for a supersized Christmas special. For his maiden voyage Joes gone to Iceland with comedian and dance champion Bill Bailey. In a packed 4 day itinerary they embrace local cuisine, alfresco bathing and some of Icelands festive folklore.

programme.title: Case File 96: The Proof Is Out There S3 15
programme.desc: Hosted by veteran TV journalist Tony Harris, the non-fiction series takes an in-depth look at some of the most incredible and thought-provoking videos of unexplained phenomena and mysterious must-see moments. programme.desc: Jamie takes us through the year, celebrating the gorgeous ingredients and what we can make with them as they come into season. programme.desc: Join Donal this Christmas as he packs up the family (and Max) to spend a few cosy days with friends for Christmas. Here, hell be creating easy and delicious seasonal recipes that are ideal for sharing, feasting, gifting and wowing over the festive season.
Sixteen strangers trek through the New Zealand Alps, facing challenges for a $1 million prize. Only survivors reaching the distant peak's summit win.

Discovered by Disaster is a factual docuseries that explores how catastrophic natural events unveil hidden treasures and reshape our understanding of history. In a world increasingly affected by climate change and extreme weather, the series highlights the paradox of destruction leading to significant archaeological discoveries.
